pkgmetadata.longdescription:
The INTEL-SA-00075-Discovery-Tool for local analysis of a single or multiple systems.
The INTEL-SA-00075-Unprovisioning-Tool will unprovision computers with Intel® Active Management Technology (Intel® AMT), Intel® Standard Manageability, and Intel® Small Business Technology (Intel® SBT) that are vulnerable to the issue identified in INTEL-SA-00075. This tool will allow you to unprovision management features, configured in Client Control Mode (CCM).
